 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76078987</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Secret Service shoots dead man at Trump's Mar-a-Lago]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T14:50:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T14:50:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/secret-service-shoots-dead-man-at-trump-s-mar-a-lago/a-76078987?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Authorities said the man breached a secure perimeter around the president's private residence and was carrying a shotgun and a fuel can.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76058634</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germans approve of democracy, but say it doesn't work well]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T14:35:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T14:35:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germans-approve-of-democracy-but-say-it-doesn-t-work-well/a-76058634?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Democracy is indispensable, according to most respondents to the new "Germany Monitor 2025" survey. However, many say it is functioning less well than in the past, and rapid change is causing great uncertainty.]]></summary>
  <category term="Germany"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76026007</id>
  <title><![CDATA[KLA veteran: 'Life is hard in Kosovo but we are free.']]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T14:34:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T14:34:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/kla-veteran-life-is-hard-in-kosovo-but-we-are-free/a-76026007?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Gezim Haxhimusa fought in the Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA). This month, he celebrated independence day by protesting against a trial in The Hague. Four KLA leaders are in the dock for war crimes.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76078205</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Russia, Ukraine report overnight strikes on energy infrastructure]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T12:48:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T12:48:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/russia-ukraine-report-overnight-strikes-on-energy-infrastructure/a-76078205?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The attacks come as Ukraine prepares to mark four years since the start of the war on February 24.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76049822</id>
  <title><![CDATA[A Ukrainian soldier’s story: Fading hope on the front line after four years of fighting]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T12:33:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T12:33:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/a-ukrainian-soldier-s-story-fading-hope-on-the-front-line-after-four-years-of-fighting/a-76049822?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Former DW correspondent Kostiantyn Honcharov joined the Ukrainian army in 2022. He describes the grim front-line situation after four years of fighting.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76077271</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Arab, Muslim nations rebuke US envoy's Israel land claim]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T12:09:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T12:09:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/arab-muslim-nations-rebuke-us-envoy-s-israel-land-claim/a-76077271?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Mike Huckabee, the US ambassador to Israel, suggested that Israel holds a biblical entitlement to a large portion of the Middle East.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76076414</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Trump says sending 'great hospital boat' to Greenland]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T10:27:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T10:27:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/trump-says-sending-great-hospital-boat-to-greenland/a-76076414?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The US president said a vessel was "on the way" to Greenland, with the move coming amid a rift between the US and Europe over control of the island. Denmark hit back, saying no medical help is needed.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76076823</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germany news: New rules aim to give asylum-seekers job access]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T10:10:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T10:10:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germany-news-new-rules-aim-to-give-asylum-seekers-job-access/live-76076823?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Germany is hoping to boost integration by making it possible for asylum-seekers to start working after just three months in the country. Meanwhile, a social media ban for children is gaining momentum. Follow DW.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76072991</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Fact check: Are China's robot soldiers just AI fakes?]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T06:28:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T06:28:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/fact-check-are-china-s-robot-soldiers-just-ai-fakes/a-76072991?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Videos that suggest China may be building a robot army sound like science fiction, but social media says it's real. DW Fact Check investigates.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76075912</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Pakistan says militant hideouts struck along Afghan border]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-22T01:34:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-22T01:34:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/pakistan-says-militant-hideouts-struck-along-afghan-border/a-76075912?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Islamabad blames Afghan-based militants for a surge in deadly suicide bombings in the country and said 7 camps belonging to the Pakistani Taliban were targeted.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76075479</id>
  <title><![CDATA[US: Technical issues force NASA to postpone moon mission]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T20:32:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T20:32:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/us-technical-issues-force-nasa-to-postpone-moon-mission/a-76075479?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The US space agency has said an issue with fuel supply is the culprit, though the source of the problem has not yet been found. The scheduled flyby is to be the first manned mission to the moon in five decades.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76072428</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Berlinale: 'Yellow Letters' wins the Golden Bear award]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T19:33:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T19:33:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/berlinale-yellow-letters-wins-the-golden-bear-award/a-76072428?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The political drama by Oscar nominee Ilker Catak took the top award at the Berlin International Film Festival.]]></summary>
  <category term="Culture"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76070061</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Trump tariffs: EU grapples with fallout of US court ruling]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T16:55:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T16:55:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/trump-tariffs-eu-grapples-with-fallout-of-us-court-ruling/a-76070061?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[European leaders and businesses have responded to the US Supreme Court's decision to rule many of US President Donald Trump's tariffs illegal with both cautious optimism and deep uncertainty.]]></summary>
  <category term="Business"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76073567</id>
  <title><![CDATA[US trade war: Trump raises global tariffs to 15% from 10%]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T16:29:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T16:29:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/us-trade-war-trump-raises-global-tariffs-to-15-from-10/live-76073567?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Donald Trump said he's raising the global 10% tariff to 15%, a day after the Supreme Court blocked much of the US president's emergency tariffs. DW has the latest.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76059861</id>
  <title><![CDATA[1916: The bloody battle of Verdun]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T15:54:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T15:54:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/1916-the-bloody-battle-of-verdun/a-76059861?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The small, French town was the site of one of the bloodiest chapters of World War I, where German and French soldiers battled for 300 days — with neither side emerging victorious.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76072701</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Ukraine strikes missile plant deep inside Russia]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T14:38:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T14:38:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/ukraine-strikes-missile-plant-deep-inside-russia/a-76072701?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The Votkinsk factory, that produces ballistic missiles, is more than 1,400 kilometers (870 miles) from Ukraine.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76072073</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Giant tortoises reintroduced to a Galapagos island]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T12:55:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T12:55:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/giant-tortoises-reintroduced-to-a-galapagos-island/a-76072073?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Ecuador released 158 juveniles in the first phase of an ambitious rewilding effort at the World Heritage Site.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76070002</id>
  <title><![CDATA[French rally for slain far-right activist Quentin Deranque]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T11:06:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T11:06:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/french-rally-for-slain-far-right-activist-quentin-deranque/a-76070002?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Thousands have marched in Lyon to honor Quentin Deranque, a far-right activist who was fatally beaten by a group of attackers during a protest against the hard-left France Unbowed (LFI) party.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76069356</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germany news: Merz rallies base at Stuttgart CDU conference]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T10:06:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T10:06:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germany-news-merz-rallies-base-at-stuttgart-cdu-conference/live-76069356?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The second day of the conference saw the party vote on dozens of proposals. Federal members came out strong against sugar taxes, call-in sick days, Muslim facial coverings, relaxed debt limits and much more. Follow DW.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76067294</id>
  <title><![CDATA[No reckoning over ethnic cleansing of Bulgaria's Turks]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T08:30:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T08:30:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/no-reckoning-over-ethnic-cleansing-of-bulgaria-s-turks/a-76067294?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Bulgaria's Turkish community, descendants of Ottoman settlers, suffered severe persecution under the communist regime. Yet little has been done to address the injustice.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:76063764</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germany cuts funding for integration of refugees]]></title>
  <updated>2026-02-21T06:26:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-02-21T06:26:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germany-cuts-funding-for-integration-of-refugees/a-76063764?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The German Interior Ministry is restricting access to voluntary integration courses for immigrants, citing budget constraints. Many critics consider this a disastrous decision.]]></summary>
  <category term="Germany"/>
 </entry>
</feed>
